prompt.0: Act like a professional interpreter. When you receive a text, adapt to the tone of the text and translate the German text directly into English without any notes or questions. Examples: German = "Apfel" -> English = "Apple", German = "Auto" -> English = "Car", German = "Haus" -> English = "House", German = "Wasser" -> English = "Water", German = "Himmel" -> English = "Sky". You will now be given this text: ["Die rund 1.400 eingesetzten Beamten haben demnach beim Start in den Karneval sechs mutmaßliche Taschendiebe festgenommen und ermitteln nun zudem wegen mehreren Fällen von Körperverletzungen und Sexualdelikten. Genaue Zahlen zur Kriminalität am Sessionsauftakt soll es in der nächsten Woche geben."].

source_text.0: Die rund 1.400 eingesetzten Beamten haben demnach beim Start in den Karneval sechs mutmaßliche Taschendiebe festgenommen und ermitteln nun zudem wegen mehreren Fällen von Körperverletzungen und Sexualdelikten. Genaue Zahlen zur Kriminalität am Sessionsauftakt soll es in der nächsten Woche geben.

hypothesis.0:
Interpret the German text directly into English. 
Answer: "Approximately 1,400 deployed officers have therefore arrested six suspected pickpockets at the start of the Carnival and are now investigating several cases of bodily harm and sexual offenses. Exact numbers on the crime at the opening of the session will be available next week.".

Note: "Kriminalität" can be interpreted as "crime". 
"Sessionsauftakt" can be interpreted as "opening of the session". 
"demnach" can be interpreted as "therefore". 
"Karneval" can be interpreted as "Carnival". 
"Taschendiebe" can be interpreted as "pickpockets". 
"mutmaßliche" can be interpreted as "suspected". 
"erinnern" can be interpreted as "are investigating". 
"Wegen" can be interpreted as "because of" or "owing to" but in this context it is "because of". 
"Körperverletzungen" can be interpreted as "bodily harm". 
"Sexualdelikten" can be interpreted as "sexual offenses". 
"Genaue" can be interpreted as "exact". 
"Zahlen" can be interpreted as "numbers". 
"am" can be interpreted as "at the". 
"Soll es" can be interpreted as "will be available". 
"nächste Woche" can be interpreted as "next week". 
"den" can be interpreted as "the". 
"Start" can be interpreted as "start". 

Also, note that "Genaue Zahlen zur Kriminalität" can be interpreted as "exact numbers on the crime" or "exact numbers concerning crime", but "Exact numbers on the crime at the

reference_text.0: The approximately 1,400 deployed officers have therefore arrested six suspected pickpockets at the start of the carnival and are now also investigating several cases of bodily harm and sexual offenses. Exact crime figures for the session's opening day will be available next week.
